capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's family background and it seems pretty clear that he does indeed have a lineage of wizards. I mean, his parents were both giants, but they had magical abilities too, which is why Hagrid inherited those traits. It's not something you can just deny or question, so yeah, I'm confident in saying that Hagrid has a wizarding heritage.
